caption:
✨ COMPETITION TIME ✨
New Opening Alert: We’ve teamed up with our new fav neighbourhood gem @pippinsrestaurant to treat three lucky winners to the ultimate foodie experience 🌿🍸🍴

Here’s what you could win:
🍷 PRIZE no. 1:  A cosy, candle-lit three-course dinner for two, with drinks, plus dessert in their stunning garden
🥐 PRIZE no. 2 - The ultimate weekend brunch for two, with all the trimmings
🍸 PRIZE no. 3 - Amazing cocktails & seriously good bar snacks at their beautiful cocktail bar

That’s three magical ways to soak up the vibes and flavours at this brand new modern British hideaway in West London ✨

To enter:
1. LIKE & SAVE this post ❤️
2. TAG your ultimate dinner date with a COMMENT below 👇
3. FOLLOW @pippinsrestaurant and @clerkenwellboyec1 - the winners will be contacted via DM 📨

Must be 18+ and based in the UK. 
Winners announced at the end of April 2025. 
GOOD LUCK! 🥂

🌿 ABOUT @PIPPINSRESTAURANT 🌿
- We had a sneak peek at the menu and the space. 
- Think: a seasonal, garden-to-table menu with nostalgic British flavours and proper culinary flair. 
- There’s a cocktail bar to sink into, a hidden garden to escape to, and dishes you’ll be dreaming about for days.

Some of our faves:

🍴 Snacks
- Crispy chicken wings with caviar
- Spiced shrimp toast
- Fried Maldon oysters with warm tartare sauce

🌱 Starters
- Spring vegetable salad
- Hereford beef tartar
- Sea bass, caviar, English apple & green shiso

🔥 Mains
- Mum’s Shepherd’s Pie for two
- Grilled 30-day aged Hereford ribeye
- Chicken & chips
- Cornish day boat fish

🍫 Desserts
- Templeton trifle
- Seasonal tarts
- Chocolate mousse with brownie & dark chocolate cream

📍If you’re into seasonal menus, neighbourhood charm, and hidden garden magic - this one’s for you! 

🎬 @clerkenwellboyec1
